title: Not to Brag, But I Just Checked Off My Holiday Gift List With These 32 Items
excerpt: Shop our editor's curation of small fashion and beauty gifts including cashmere socks, silky pajamas, ballet flats, and more.
text: We're currently in the thick of the year's busiest season. There are meals to plan, groceries to buy, flights to book, and bags to pack, but I'm here to remind you not to sweat the small stuff—more specifically, the small gifts. I'm an intentional gift giver—I refuse to let my loved ones unwrap something they don't want—but I'm learning that sometimes it's just not that serious. It's okay not to give an ornately decorated gift basket filled with the dinner party host's top five favorite products of all time (I whisper to myself as I frantically run around the mall 30 minutes before the party starts). The holiday season is stressful enough, so instead of going big, go for the easy yet thoughtful gifts I've rounded up for you here. There are cute and cozy items like cashmere socks and silky pajamas, luxe accessories like an oxblood cardholder and a Jenni Kayne belt, innovative beauty tools, editor-favorite fragrances, and so much more. Shop these "small" gifts below so you can focus on the big picture this holiday season. Mavi Laurel Denim Jacket in Dark Blue Denim This style is reminiscent of the Japanese denim jacket that's currently trending within the streetwear scene. Old Navy Holiday Print Mock-Neck Sweater Now this is a holiday themed sweater I can get behind. Jimmy Choo Umika Garnet Leather Card Holder The color to be buying this season. Jenni Kayne Leather Audrey Belt For the subtle luxury lover. Coach Outlet Star Cluster Bag Charm When in doubt, always go for a bag charm. Mavi Polo Sweater in Antique White Stripe Give the gift of this season's trendiest top: a polo sweater. Old Navy Satin Pajama Pant Set I don't know anyone who doesn't love to receive a matching PJ set. Levi's® x McLaren Racing Speed Bandana The kind of souvenir fashion people approve of. Etro Leather Purse With Pegaso Small leather accessories are always a safe but chic bet. Levi's® Rigid Denim Apron Banana Republic 90s Archive Trouser Sock With Cashmere Cozy, practical, and cute. There is no such thing as too many tote bags. Banana Republic Signature Cashmere Scarf A scarf is "neutral good" in the world of gifting. Had to slip something in for the stylish men in your life. Banana Republic Signature Cashmere Long Gloves I finally found long gloves that fit comfortably under jacket and sweater sleeves. Vince Camuto x Emily Travis Reese Ballet Flat Ballet flats are still having a moment and will not be slowing down for winter. GANNI Ganni X New Balance Silver and Pink Fft Trainers Ganni and New Balance have released a new collaboration just in time for the holidays. Vince Camuto Vinica Mary Jane Flat Mary Jane flats you'll happily wear into 2025. Vince Camuto Merissa Boot I will be buying these for myself if anyone was wondering. T3 Airebrush 1 Step Smoothing and Volumizing Hair Dryer Brush This tool gives a salon-level blowout. I came for the packaging, and stayed for the luxe ingredients. Beauty editors adore this brush. Byredo Mojave Ghost Hand Cream A small, but thoughtful gift. Maison Louis Marie No.04 Bois De Balincourt Luxury Gift Set Gifting a luxury fragrance is easy when it comes in the form of a cult-favorite scent set. I don't know which I love more: the shade or the packaging. Trust me, this one smells like a dream. Kora Organics Brightening & Exfoliating Turmeric Face Mask I'll be putting this one in my mom's stocking this year. Solawave 4-In-1 Red Light Therapy Skincare Wand & Activating Serum Kit This is the first skincare tool I've used that shows an immediate difference in my skin. Trinny London Flush Blush Bring this to your girlfriend's gift exchange this year and everyone will be fighting for it. Solawave Radiant Renewal 2-In-1 Skincare Mini Much like the wand above, this smaller version also visibly improves firmness and radiance while de-puffing. Tarte Maracuja Juicy Plump Rose Trio Not sure which shade to buy? How about all three? Tatcha Kissu Hydrating Leave-On Lip Treatment Mask The most stress-free beauty gift you can buy is this lip mask—it is universally loved.
html:
We're currently in the thick of the year's busiest season. There are meals to plan, groceries to buy, flights to book, and bags to pack, but I'm here to remind you not to sweat the small stuff—more specifically, the small gifts. I'm an intentional gift giver—I refuse to let my loved ones unwrap something they don't want—but I'm learning that sometimes it's just not that serious. It's okay not to give an ornately decorated gift basket filled with the dinner party host's top five favorite products of all time (I whisper to myself as I frantically run around the mall 30 minutes before the party starts). The holiday season is stressful enough, so instead of going big, go for the easy yet thoughtful gifts I've rounded up for you here. There are cute and cozy items like cashmere socks and silky pajamas, luxe accessories like an oxblood cardholder and a Jenni Kayne belt, innovative beauty tools, editor-favorite fragrances, and so much more. Shop these "small" gifts below so you can focus on the big picture this holiday season.

Mavi

Laurel Denim Jacket in Dark Blue Denim

This style is reminiscent of the Japanese denim jacket that's currently trending within the streetwear scene.

Old Navy

Holiday Print Mock-Neck Sweater

Now this is a holiday themed sweater I can get behind.

Jimmy Choo

Umika Garnet Leather Card Holder

The color to be buying this season.

Jenni Kayne

Leather Audrey Belt

For the subtle luxury lover.

Coach Outlet

Star Cluster Bag Charm

When in doubt, always go for a bag charm.

Mavi

Polo Sweater in Antique White Stripe

Give the gift of this season's trendiest top: a polo sweater.

Old Navy

Satin Pajama Pant Set

I don't know anyone who doesn't love to receive a matching PJ set.

Levi's® x McLaren

Racing Speed Bandana

The kind of souvenir fashion people approve of.

Etro

Leather Purse With Pegaso

Small leather accessories are always a safe but chic bet.

Levi's®

Rigid Denim Apron

Banana Republic

90s Archive Trouser Sock With Cashmere

Cozy, practical, and cute.

There is no such thing as too many tote bags.

Banana Republic

Signature Cashmere Scarf

A scarf is "neutral good" in the world of gifting.

Had to slip something in for the stylish men in your life.

Banana Republic

Signature Cashmere Long Gloves

I finally found long gloves that fit comfortably under jacket and sweater sleeves.

Vince Camuto x Emily Travis

Reese Ballet Flat

Ballet flats are still having a moment and will not be slowing down for winter.

GANNI

Ganni X New Balance Silver and Pink Fft Trainers

Ganni and New Balance have released a new collaboration just in time for the holidays.

Vince Camuto

Vinica Mary Jane Flat

Mary Jane flats you'll happily wear into 2025.

Vince Camuto

Merissa Boot

I will be buying these for myself if anyone was wondering.

T3

Airebrush 1 Step Smoothing and Volumizing Hair Dryer Brush

This tool gives a salon-level blowout.

I came for the packaging, and stayed for the luxe ingredients.

Beauty editors adore this brush.

Byredo

Mojave Ghost Hand Cream

A small, but thoughtful gift.

Maison Louis Marie

No.04 Bois De Balincourt Luxury Gift Set

Gifting a luxury fragrance is easy when it comes in the form of a cult-favorite scent set.

I don't know which I love more: the shade or the packaging.

Trust me, this one smells like a dream.

Kora Organics

Brightening & Exfoliating Turmeric Face Mask

I'll be putting this one in my mom's stocking this year.

Solawave

4-In-1 Red Light Therapy Skincare Wand & Activating Serum Kit

This is the first skincare tool I've used that shows an immediate difference in my skin.

Trinny London

Flush Blush

Bring this to your girlfriend's gift exchange this year and everyone will be fighting for it.

Solawave

Radiant Renewal 2-In-1 Skincare Mini

Much like the wand above, this smaller version also visibly improves firmness and radiance while de-puffing.

Tarte

Maracuja Juicy Plump Rose Trio

Not sure which shade to buy? How about all three?

Tatcha

Kissu Hydrating Leave-On Lip Treatment Mask

The most stress-free beauty gift you can buy is this lip mask—it is universally loved.
